title: Make the most of your roast
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Baking
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery (Meat)
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Food presentation
description: Episode of Series "Meat makes the meal". Produced for the Australian Meat Board, this film demonstrates clearly and simply the steps essential in making a good roast. Tips such as keeping the oven temperature low, placing the meat on a grill and using a meat thermometer are explained and demonstrated.
